userStories.title: Research BMAD Framework architecture and capabilities

context.description: Research the BMAD (Blackbox Method for Agent Development) framework. Analyze its architecture, key components, workflows, agents, and how it integrates with the overall Blackbox5 system. Document findings in .blackbox5/engine/frameworks/1-bmad/RESEARCH.md

userStories.title: Research SpecKit framework architecture and capabilities

context.description: Research the SpecKit framework. Analyze its slash commands, templates, architecture, and how it enables spec-driven development. Document findings in .blackbox5/engine/frameworks/2-speckit/RESEARCH.md

userStories.title: Research MetaGPT framework architecture and capabilities

context.description: Research the MetaGPT framework. Analyze its multi-agent collaboration patterns, SOP generation, role-based agent system, and templates. Document findings in .blackbox5/engine/frameworks/3-metagpt/RESEARCH.md

userStories.title: Research Swarm framework architecture and capabilities

context.description: Research the Swarm framework. Analyze its multi-agent swarm patterns, emergent behavior, communication protocols, and examples. Document findings in .blackbox5/engine/frameworks/4-swarm/RESEARCH.md

userStories.title: Synthesize framework comparison and integration opportunities

context.description: Create a comprehensive comparison document analyzing all four frameworks (BMAD, SpecKit, MetaGPT, Swarm). Identify strengths, weaknesses, use cases, and opportunities for integration. Document in .blackbox5/engine/frameworks/FRAMEWORK-COMPARISON.md

Based on framework research, design recommended autonomous agent workflows that leverage the best aspects of each framework. Document in .blackbox5/engine/frameworks/AUTONOMOUS-WORKFLOW-RECOMMENDATIONS.md

metadata.goal: Comprehensively research and analyze all Blackbox5 frameworks to enable autonomous agent workflows
